name: The Twins (Mnzo)
description:
The Twins is a student adventure and 3D platform game, made on Unity for PC (during our DESS at Université de Montréal).

In this game, players are told the story of two sick twins, Ethan and Emily, who have to overcome their own grief. It is up to you to ensure that their last journey will be memorable.

Game Design & Art - Nicolas Chabot

Game Design & Development - Enzo Menegazzi

Level Design & Narration - Arnaud Guillard

Project Manager & Level Design - Virignie Lesiège

Musics - Daphné Hejebri

Sound Design - Minh Ho
